info.title: Q-CTRL API
info.description: The Q-CTRL API provides a REST interface to access advanced quantum controls

errors.description: Stack trace of the job that failed, if any

received_at.description: Marks the time when the task gets received from the worker.

runtime.description: The duration of the task's execution(in seconds).

started_at.description: Marks the time when the task started executing.

terminated_at.description: Marks the time when the task finished executing (succeeded/failed/revoked).

segment_count.description: The number of segments that this pulse will produce.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
